catalysts.description: FDA approval for chronic weight management in adults with obesity
FDA approval for type 2 diabetes
Phase 2 results published — 24.2% weight loss at 48 weeks (triple agonist)
FDA approval for chronic weight management in adults with obesity
SELECT trial results — 20% MACE risk reduction in overweight/obese adults with CV disease
catalysts.outcome: Positive — first CV outcomes data for anti-obesity medicine

catalysts.description: FDA expanded Wegovy label to include cardiovascular risk reduction
FLOW trial — 24% reduction in kidney disease progression in T2D with CKD
Phase 2 results — ~20% weight loss at 52 weeks with monthly dosing
Phase 2 topline: 14.7% weight loss at 13 weeks (SC formulation)
catalysts.outcome: Positive — best early-stage data in class

catalysts.description: REDEFINE-1 Phase 3 topline — did not beat semaglutide on co-primary endpoint; ~22.7% absolute WL
catalysts.outcome: Mixed — missed sema comparator endpoint but strong absolute WL

catalysts.description: Medicare Part D coverage for anti-obesity medications enacted
catalysts.outcome: Signed into law — ~15-20M new addressable lives

catalysts.description: Phase 3 ATTAIN-1 topline: oral small molecule GLP-1 met primary endpoint in obesity
Phase 3 VENTURE interim efficacy data in obesity
FDA submission expected for obesity (triple agonist)
Phase 3 data readout; monthly dosing differentiation
Phase 2b full data readout (oral dual agonist)
FDA submission expected (semaglutide + cagrilintide)
FDA filing expected (oral small molecule GLP-1 agonist)
Phase 3 SYNCHRONIZE-2 topline (GLP-1/glucagon dual agonist)
Potential FDA approval (best-in-class ~22% placebo-adjusted weight loss)
Potential FDA approval — first oral small molecule GLP-1
Phase 2 data expected (oral GLP-1/amylin dual agonist)
Retatrutide maintenance studies, MariTide Phase 3 completion, oral triple agonists
